ANU.biography: Roettger is especially interested in issues related to parental incarceration.  He is an internationally recognised expert in the field, and his research has examined adverse long-term outcomes associated with having a parent undergo incarceration.   His research has documented adverse outcomes in the U.S. population that include mental and physical health issues, substance abuse, delinquency, and criminal justice involvement.
